name: Easy Ops
description: Since I have been working on AWS I have realized that when I work on a new project, there is always code repeating itself from the previous projects, I started this project to enhance my AWS skills while increasing my development time by making all the basic AWS function a library, functionalities as simple as reading from an AWS resource, writing to and AWS resource and such. This Library is currently for Python developers but I am looking to collab with other developers to add more languages.

name: Data Peek
description: This project was inspired by how much data I print to the console during development and testing, so I decided to create a library to help me pretty-print data to the console/terminal such as JSON, pans tables, and other data structures, and log information using colors to make it easier to read errors and warnings. I am working on publishing this on Pypi soon.

name: Dogo
description: A pet company website built using NextJS/React application using Contentful CMS API to display pet information

name: Mucassi.Constructions
description: A construction company website for Mucassi.constructions

name: Terminal Pretty Printer
description: a tool to help with displaying nice formatted messages for debugging in python, from warnings, errors and messages.
